appearances.title: CNN This Morning : CNNW : January 15, 2026 3:00am-4:00am PST
appearances.snippet: joining us now to talk about this republican congressman, mike haridopolos of florida.thank you so much for being here. really appreciate it. my pleasure. so one of the things that's interesting to me is hearing a person, a protester on the street, because what they say echoes something we see on social media. the perception that the way i.s.i.s. operating feels unusual feels sort of scary to them. i don't know what your feed is like, so i'd love to get your point of view. >> well, first of all, it's a tragic situation. what's happening in general in minnesota. and the genesis of my opinion is the fact that you you have a criminal element that was let out of jail back into the community. it's incredibly frustrating. >> meaning who? >> meaning that persons who are here illegally also broke the law in many cases. not just violent crimes, sometimes sexual battery against children, et cetera. these i.c.e. agents are there to remove them from the community because the leadership there won't. these are called sanctuary cities. >> but where the protests in fact are seem to be

appearances.title: CNN News Central : CNNW : January 16, 2026 12:00pm-1:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: joining me now to discuss republican congressman mike haridopolos of florida. good to have you on.nks so much for taking the time. so these numbers are not good. i think you might even admit that. and just as overall approval rating has dropped again below that 40% threshold, which for presidents is, it's not a good number to be. it's 39% now was 37 in the last, in the last most recent cnn polling. does that concern you as you head towards the midterms when you'll be up? >> yeah. well, look, it's not surprising given the usual news coverage he does get. but i do know this. when i was elected last year for the first time, the big issue was immigration. we have clearly closed the border. good news. the other big issue, of course, is rising prices. we now have inflation under 3%. we have a 401(k) now about 15% higher than it was at the beginning of the year. and we also see falling interest rates and of course economic growth through the roof right now. so i think things are better than it were a year ago. but look, politics is politics. it's going to go up and down. we think our good
